description: This source file defines a FastAPI router for the '/api/chat' endpoint, which handles chat requests to an AI assistant. It sets up the POST endpoint, handles request validation, and invokes a service to process chat interactions.

methods.name: ChatResponse chat_endpoint( payload: ChatRequest, session_id: str = Depends(deps.get_session_id), x_session_id_raw: str | None = Header(default=None, alias="X-Session-ID"), )
methods.description: Async function that handles POST requests to the '/chat' endpoint, validating the input and invoking the chat processing service.
